Description of incident: Lasko Group Inc. announced a data breach of customers who purchased on-line parts from them and Air King America Inc. Both companies were the victims of "phishing" emails from an unknown third party. These fraudulent emails led to unauthorized access to their computer network. Information breached included names, email addresses, phone numbers, credit card numbers, and credit card expiration dates.The company is offering AllClearID protect your identity for one year at no cost to those affected. For those who are affected they can sign-up by calling 1-866-979-2595 or at enroll.allclearid.com. The company has also established a confidential assistance line for questions or concerns at 1-877-218-0052 from 9:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. EST.
